quote: Take care of your cents: dollars will take care of themselves. – Thomas Jefferson
fact: Firehouses have circular stairways originating from the old days when the engines were pulled by horses. The horses were stabled on the ground floor and figured out how to walk up straight staircases.
joke: Ever wondered why bees hum? It's because they don't know the words.
